text: Peninsula (; marketed in the US, UK and India as: Train to Busan Presents: Peninsula), is a 2020 South Korean zombie heist movie directed by Yeon Sang- ho, is an independent sequel to the 2016 movie Train to Busan. The Movie was in the selection of the 2020 Cannes Film Festival, although due to the COVID-19 pandemic it could not be released, it would premiere until October 21, 2020 at the Busan Film Festival, It premiered in South Korea, on July 21, 2020 and worldwide would raise $42.5 millions. == References == == Other websites == * at Well Go USA Entertainment * at StudioCanal UK * Category:2020 movies Category:2020 horror movies Category:2020 action movies Category:Korean-language movies Category:Zombie movies Category:Apocalyptic movies Category:Movies set in South Korea
title: Peninsula (movie)
